table_caption: Descriptive statistics for demographic information and mood and neuropsychological measures from the screening visit. Mood measures include the Beck Depression Inventory (BDI [42]) and Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI [43]). Dementia screening measures were the Mini Mental State Exam (MMSE [13], Brief Cognitive Rating Scale (BCRS [15]). Global Deterioration Scale (GDS [16]), and the Mattis Dementia Rating Scale (DRS [14]). The test of premorbid IQ was the Test of Premorbid Functioning (TOPF). The Repeatable Battery for the Assessment of Neuropsychological Functioning (RBANS [17]) and the Category and Letter Fluency and the Trails from the Delis Kaplan Executive Function System (D-KEFS [18]) were used to assess general neuropsychological and executive functioning.
